fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Magical: You choose your starting Hand within the first phase of the game. Max 1 non duel-won Special card. No duplicates. 
- Enchanting: When you open a channel with someone else, you learn their True role.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ensnare: Pick a player. If they have played at least 1 card this phase, prevent them from playing more. This includes cards reforged onto them. However, they may use (Reforged) cards in their Hand. [1 use, Unique]
- Enrapture: Pick a player. Any card they use for themselves next phase will be Trapped. [1 use, Unique]
- Silence: Pick a player. Prevent them from using abilities in the next phase. [1 use, Unique]
